title: Press Reader
seo_title: Press Reader | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Complimentary access to digital newspapers and magazines
shortdescrp: Complimentary access to digital newspapers and magazines
contents:
We are committed to helping you make the most of our Residents’ stay.

That is why we are giving you complimentary access to thousands of newspapers and magazines from more than 120 countries on PressReader, every time you stay with us. Stay informed and get inspired. Connect to stories you care about, even while you travel.

 

Here’s how the get connected:

  • Log onto the Wi-Fi
  • Download PressReader
  • Read your favorite titles
  • After you depart the hotel, you will still have complimentary access to PressReader for 24-hours
